original_text: Drop down, ye heavens, from above, and let the skies pour down righteousness: let the earth open, and let them bring forth salvation, and let righteousness spring up together; I the Lord have created it.
korean_text: 하늘이여 위로부터 공의를 뿌리며 구름이여 의를 부을지어다 땅이여 열려서 구원을 싹트게 하고 공의도 함께 움돋게 할지어다 나 여호와가 이 일을 창조하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Drop down, ye heavens, from above
and let the skies pour down righteousness
and let them bring forth salvation
and let righteousness spring up together
I the Lord have created it
